title: Black Panther cast talks power of fashion in New York
text:
Black Panther cast talks power of fashion in New York 12:14pm GMT - 01:31 
''Afro-punk is a political statement, of the world where we are right now'' - 'Black Panther' costume designer on film marking a cultural shift in the movie and fashion industries. Rough cut (no reporter narration). ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
"Afro-punk is a political statement, of the world where we are right now" - 'Black Panther' costume designer on film marking a cultural shift in the movie and fashion industries.
